productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Strength repair for dry, damaged hair. Reinforces weakened bonds with immediately visible results.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Customize your damage solution Bonding Benefits In One Step There's no reason to toss your existing haircare just to trying Bonding Care. Add Acidic Bonding Concentrate Intensive Treatment prior and experience Redken's Bonding Care Complex for smoother, shinier, stronger and healthier-feeling hair. With each use, hair is fortiifed against future damage. 4 Steps To Stronger Hair Coloring your hair or using heat tools? Your hair bonds may be weak. The 4-step system with Redken's Bonding Care Complex from start to finish. The pH balanced formula keeps hair at it's optimal acidity, while repairing strength and deep conditioning for stronger, shinier, vibrant hair.

What are hair bonds? Bonds help keep the fibers within hair together. Damage over time, causes bonds to become weak creating frizzy, breakage, lack of shine and, overall, unmanageable hair. Bonding Goes Beyond The Cuticle Penetrates the cuticle and reinforces weakened bonds. COMBATS 1 YEAR OF VISIBLE DAMAGE IN 1 USE* *Acidic Bonding Concentrate Intensive Treatment, Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave-In vs. Undamaged Hair Color Fade Protection & More Redken's patent pending Bonding Care Complex helps reinforce weak bonds to provide less breakage, increased resilience, color fade protection and more. Healthy hair starts with strong bonds.

4 Steps to Transform your Hair Experience Redken's Bonding Care Complex formulated with Citric Acid. Redken's system reinforces weakened hair bonds, repairs your hair's strength, and keeps hair color vibrant! 2X STRONGER HAIR** **System of shampoo and conditioner vs. non-conditioning shampoo. Results gathered via a study with an external subcontractor in Aug 2020 to evaluate the anti-breakage/strength integrity of the hair with the system of Acidic Bonding Concentrate Shampoo and Conditioner vs non-conditioning shampoo

Why is an acidic haircare product good for my hair? Healthy hair is acidic with pH levels from 4.5 and 5.5. Every day exposures to common elements like water and chlorine have higher, more alkaline pH levels that cause damage to hair. Acidic products have a lower pH to help re-balance your pH levels. How is Acidic Bonding Concentrate different than other bonding products? Acidic Bonding Concentrate products are made with Citric Acid, which helps strengthen damaged hair. Most bonding products are treatments or in salon services which are more time consuming and an additional step in your regimen. How much of this product should I use? The Acidic Bonding Concentrate System is concentrated, which means you do not need as much as your normal haircare routine. We recommend starting with a dime size amount and increasing from there based on your hair thickness, length and preference. Is the Acidic Bonding Concentrate system suitable for color-treated hair? Yes, the Acidic Bonding Concentrate Intensive Treatment is suitable for color-treated hair. Do you have to use the intensive treatment with Acidic Bonding Concentrate Shampoo and Conditioner? Yes, it's recommended to use the Intensive Treatment with Acidic Bonding Concentrate Shampoo and conditioner as a system. However, the treatment delivers benefits of its own and can be used with another Redken haircare range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is one of my favorites (along with the shampoo). It really has made my blonde hair feel so much softer and healthier. I know the price may seem high but you really don’t need as much product (average amount of hair) when you are washing your hair compared to a cheaper conditioner that is watered down. I definitely recommend giving this a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best conditioning and strengthening product I've ever used. I typically only was my hair 2x a week so I use this every time. I have blonde highlights and my hair was starting to break. After using this product, my hair is soooo much stronger and looks and feels so good. Be sure to leave in for the 5mins suggested. I leave in for 2mins, then I brush through it before rinsing off after 5mins. It's pricey but you definitely get what you pay for!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it!
reviews.reviewText: If you’ve tried everything from Olaplex to coconut oil to revive your dead ends and hair- look no further!Did I want to love a $30 bottle of conditioner- no. Will I ever buy another hair care routine? Also no.It’s. Phenomenal. I haven’t trimmed my hair in over a year and it looks and feels SO healthy!I did use the whole routine of the Redken Bonding Concentrate, shampoo, and conditioner full disclosure but again won’t be buying anything else ever again. Seriously Olaplex is a joke compared to what this does for your hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Supposed to help with thinning hair.
reviews.reviewText: My hair dresser suggested I try this shampoo, conditioner, and leave-in conditioner for my thinning hair. It will take some time to see if it works. I see a little less hair in my brush however it may only be wishful. It does smell nice, fresh, and clean. The set is very expensive so use sparingly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it !
reviews.reviewText: It works within a week and it smells amazing .It leaves your hair soft .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game changer shampoo and conditioner
reviews.reviewText: My hair looks the best it’s ever looked, it’s shinny and healthy. However the best thing is by using this product I can now go around 5-7 days withoutWashing my hair. I have oily hair and use to wash everyday. These products are so good they’ve cut that out and my hair looks better than it ever has. I know it’s pricey, but I don’t use it as often as I use to use shampoo and conditioner, so the higher price is worth it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair loves it, my bank account - not so much.
reviews.reviewText: My stylist turned me on to this shampoo and conditioner line by accident. I was able to purchase my first bottle of each (and the leave-in cream) at half the cost through another channel. My fine (highlighted) hair that's prone to breakage absolutely seems to love this product line. The full retail cost is incredibly prohibitive, even though the shampoo lasts me 2-3 times as long as a bottle of the conditioner (and one bottle of the conditioner lasts me about a month). Unfortunately, my hair soaks the conditioner in, so it's not like it's lasting me long enough to justify the full retail cost. Having said that, I do feel like the cost is fair if you're able to purchase it at a discounted rate. I'd definitely do some research to investigate other channels to purchase at a more economical price.I'm very picky about scents, and really had to work hard to not hate the smell of the Redken Extreme line (which is what I'd used prior to this). The Acidic Bonding line has a very gender neutral scent: it's on the lighter side, though it definitely is scented, but it fades quickly, so you don't walk around smelling like your shampoo and conditioner all day. That's a plus for me, but I don't LOVE the scent. I'd call it tolerable.Does this line do what it promises? It does, though it can get heavy on fine hair. I've tested it to see if I can skip a few days and use other product lines in between, just to save on cost. I'm pretty certain that once you've washed with something else, that's it - and the "glue" that's bonding your split ends and frayed strands is gone until you've used this for another week straight to replace it all again. A little does go a long way, but be warned if you have porous hair that loves conditioner: you'll still use less than you're used to using with other product lines, but you'll definitely go through this quicker than the shampoo. On the flip side, while I'm on my first bottle of shampoo, and third or fourth bottle of conditioner, I'm not even halfway through my first tube of the leave-in product. That makes it the most economical purchase in the line, IMO, and the one thing that I can totally justify purchasing at full retail since it's likely to last me 3-4 months.Overall, I really do like this product line, and I would be a faithful, dedicated, every-day-no-matter-what user if only the price were more reasonable. At $30 a bottle for a shampoo and conditioner, this is a luxury purchase purchase for me regardless of how much I like it, so I'm sort of forced to try to extend my time between purchases and intersperse it with other product lines - unless I can purchase in bulk at a more reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Not at all what I expected. I’ve been using the shampoo, conditioner, and leave in conditioner now for alittle over a month washing my hair 2-3 times a week. And sadly this isn’t bonding or repairing my hair. My hair seems to be getting frizzier than it was before.
Excelente producto. Lo recomiendo ampliamente. El cabello se siente como el de las muñecas

reviews.reviewTitle: Works really well adds softness and lifts volume
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product it softens and repairs you can actually feel the difference when your hair is damaged then you use this it really works to heal and repair hair structure, a bit pricey but It’s worth it . Has a pleasant scent not over powering. This product really adds life to your hair and volume and restores shine . Love it 😍

reviews.reviewTitle: La gamme abc de Redken au top!
reviews.reviewText: Très bon produit testé chez ma coiffeuse, le cheveu n’a plus de frisottis, c’est génial ( j’ai un cheveu à 3 textures (brun, gris et blanc) c’était compliqué pour les maîtriser … je recommande la gamme complète (l’avant shampoing abc, à faire une fois par mois, le shampoing et cet après shampoing qui lissent les écailles du cheveu … envie de tester la gamme bleue pour cheveux blancs et gris ….Je recommande la gamme abc de Redken ☺️Bon sur 3 produits de la gamme commandes, le flacon d’après shampoing était abîmée voir photo… sinon ça va
He probado el champú y acondicionador y de verdad que desde el primer uso se nota el efecto, tengo el pelo impecable y súper hidratado (tengo raíz grasa y no me ha engrasado nada!!)
